price: En cambio, a los creyentes que obran rectamente les tengo reservada una recompensa inagotable.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti falahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
